TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripContainer extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl

summary.span: 提供表單每一邊上的面板，以及可以保存一或多個控制項的中央面板。

span.span: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似於。 is similar to . 它會使用四個停駐的側邊面板 (的執行個體) 和一個中央面板 (執行個體) 來建立一般的排列方式。It uses four docked side panels (instances of ) and one central panel (an instance of ) to create a typical arrangement. 您無法移除側邊面板中，但您可以設定其各自隱藏， ， ，和屬性`false`。You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective , , , and properties to `false`. 根據預設，每一個屬性是`true`在設計階段。By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time. 在設計階段，也隨即出現，並已經展開其上方面板。Also at design time, the appears with its top panel already expanded. 您不可以移除或隱藏。You can neither remove nor hide the . 您可以使用一或多個排列， ，或側邊面板中，而且您的控制項可用於其他控制項的中央面板。You can arrange one or more , , or controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls. 也可用來取得轉譯器支援為一致的外觀的表單的本文。The also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance. 不支援多個文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式。 does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications. 使用MDI 應用程式。Use for MDI applications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將和至 Windows Form 中，加入項目至，並加入至的。The following code example demonstrates adding a and a to a Windows Forms, adding items to the , and adding the to the of the . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.toolstripcontainer2/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.toolstripcontainer2/vb/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
